title: Sarah Vaughan - Sarah+2 (1962) RESEED
description:
MP3/256kbps

When a Sarah Vaughan album titled After Hours sold better than others -- despite featuring only guitar and bass accompaniment -- they replicated the formula for 1962&#039;s wonderful Sarah + 2. Only the personnel changed; Barney Kessel took over from Mundell Lowe, while Joe Comfort stood in for George Duvivier on bass. The results are excellent, highlighting the power of Vaughan&#039;s voice, whether she&#039;s singing a rosy "All I Do Is Dream of You" or one of the most turgid torch songs, "All or Nothing at All." Her best feature is "When Sunny Gets Blue," a spotlight for her dynamic range. ~All Music Guide

Personel:
Sarah Vaughan :Vocalist
Joe Comfort :Bass
Barney Kessel :Guitar

Track Listing:
1. Just In Time
2. When Sunny Gets Blue 
3. All I Do Is Dream Of You
4. I Understand 
5. Goodnight Sweetheart 
6. Baby Won&#039;t You Please Come Home 
7. When Lights Are Low 
8. Key Largo 
9. Just Squeeze Me 
10. All Or Nothing At All 
11. Very Thought Of Yo
